    • Content

      /**
 * An example transform data
 *
 * Creates a new dataset by merging the other two. 
 *
 * @author Markus Schaffner
 */
 
 clear
 
 // switch to the working directory
cd "~/Dropbox/Stata_conference_2015/example"

log using "log/prepare.smcl", smcl replace

use "dta/auto.dta"

merge 1:1 make using "dta/autornd.dta"

rename _merge match

// generate some derived variables
gen turn2 = turn^2
gen price2 = price^2

gen expensive = 0
replace expensive = 1 if price > 7500

save "dta/auto_merged.dta", replace

log close

//eof

        prepare   prepare do
